'''''gwathren''''' (plural ''gwethrin'') is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "shadowy, dim".<ref name=VT42/>

==Etymology==

*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[WATH]]<ref name=VT42>{{VT|42a}}, p. 9</ref>

==Examples==

*''[[Ered Wethrin|Ered '''Wethrin''']]''<ref name=Hiswe>[http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en-strict.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] (accessed 31 December 2010)</ref>

==Cognates==

*Sindarin ''[[gwathui]]''
*Sindarin ''[[gwath]]''
